archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Receive Party Payment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Receive and verify a payment made by a party that references a party or an account in the name of a party.

properties.value: Receive Party Payment receives and verifies a payment made by a party that references a party or an account in the name of a party. The payment may reference a purchase/bill/charge to which the payment should be applied and includes the method of payment. A receipt may be provided if requested by the party making the payment.
